name: SpaceBar (zepedrob16)
description:
SpaceBar is a game where you play as a bartender and interact with your clients through your cocktails. 

How to play: Using the X key to access your bar’s shelf and arrow keys to navigate through your finest collection of drinks, you will be able to mix them in different combinations in order to advise your 3 different clients on how they should react to a certain problem they present you.

Regarding your cocktails, they must consist of 1 out of 2 base ingredients and 1 out of 3 reagents, maxing a total of 6 combinations.

In this game, since every combination influences the client’s response to a certain situation in a different way, you will be able to find 13 different outcomes for your clients’ story (and for yours).
